original_text: Jesus did this first miracle at Cana, in Galilee. In this way, Jesus showed how great and powerful he was. And his disciples believed in him.
korean_text: 예수께서 이 첫 표적을 갈릴리 가나에서 행하여 그의 영광을 나타내시매 제자들이 그를 믿으니라

sentences.original_text: Jesus did this first miracle at Cana
sentences.korean_translation: 예수님은 가나에서 이 첫 번째 기적을 행하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: In this way, Jesus showed how great and powerful he was
sentences.korean_translation: 이렇게 예수님은 자신이 얼마나 위대하고 강력한지 보여주셨습니다

sentences.original_text: And his disciples believed in him
